synopsis.text: Three high school students, Yumi, O-Kei, and Mai, are not your average teenagers. They possess extraordinary psychic abilities, with Yumi being a psychokinesist, O-Kei a telepathist, and Mai having superhuman strength. Together, they form the 'Gakuen Choujotai', or the Academy Super Girl Team, a group dedicated to upholding justice. Despite their powers, the girls are still learning to harness their abilities effectively. Their skills are put to the test when they stumble upon a dubious club at Yamashiro Academy known as the 'Psychic Power Research Society'. As they delve deeper, they discover a sinister plot to manipulate the minds of the students. Based on a novel from 1986, this anime follows the Academy Super Girl Team as they navigate the challenges of their powers and face off against the Psychic Power Research Society. Will they be able to uncover the truth and save their fellow students?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
